(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)go\.sum$
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.wav$
^\.github/
^\Qhttptransport/discoveryhandler_gen.go\E$
